item.title: Lulu
item.description: Ma trombine Who am I ? Lucien or âœ¨Luluâœ¨, 22 years old, bald shaved, full of energy and so talkative I decided to tell my life to the internet itself. On a more serious note, I’m actually a french engineering student at ENSAM aka Arts et MÃ©tiers, which makes me a Gadz’Arts (fr) (basically an equivalent of a frat boy without the part where we talk to girls since we don’t have any).

item.title: Lulunomicon
item.description: Welcome to the Lulunomicon, first of all let’s define it : Lulunomicon, noun : A collection of links, definitions and tips that might help you find your way in Lulu’s Shenanigans. Use it without restraint because it will be your best friend and will definitely come out handy ! Be careful though, the Lulunomicon seems to be alive at certain times… Take everything it tells you with a grain of salt ðŸ§‚.
